products.title: Products
products.configureSubheader: Upload an Excel or CSV template to define your product structure
products.notConfigured: Products are not configured yet. Please upload a template to get started.
products.needConfiguration: You need to configure first the Product
products.dragDrop: Drag and drop files here or click to browse
products.downloadExplain: Download a template to see the expected format. The template includes:
products.row1Text: Column names (e.g., name, sku, price, quantity)
products.row2Text: Column types (TEXT, INTEGER, DECIMAL, DATE, BOOLEAN, MINIO_IMAGE, MINIO_FILE)
products.tooltipAllTypes: Includes all available column types with examples

products.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this product?

import.title: Import Template
import.description: Upload an Excel/CSV template to analyze columns and configure a domain table.
import.alreadyConfigured: This component is already configured. Use the reset option below if you need to reconfigure it.
import.alreadyConfiguredNonAdmin: This component is already configured. Please contact an administrator if you need to reconfigure it.
import.resetDescription: Warning: Resetting this configuration will delete the table and all its data. This action cannot be undone.
import.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset this configuration? This will delete the table and all its data. This action cannot be undone.
import.domainConfigured: The {{domain}} component is configured and ready to use.
import.domainConfiguredSource: The {{domain}} component is configured and ready to use ({{source}}).

google.intro: Connect a Google Sheet to automatically configure and populate a component.
google.step1Description: Choose the component that will be synchronized with Google Sheets.
google.step2Description: Provide the Google Sheet details that will be used to configure the component.
google.connectError: Failed to connect the Google Sheet. Please try again.
google.successDetail: Google Sheet connection saved. The component will be configured shortly.
google.domainRequired: Please select a component before continuing.
google.fileRequired: Select a Google Sheet before continuing.
google.shareHint: After selecting a file, make sure it is shared with the service account email so the backend can read it.
google.missingConfig: Google integration is not configured. Ask an administrator to set the Google client ID and API key.
google.credentialsMissing: Google service account credentials are missing. Upload the JSON key to the backend or configure the credential path before trying again.
google.pickerNotReady: The Google Drive picker is still loading. Please try again in a moment.
google.oauthDenied: Access to Google Drive was denied. Please allow access and try again.
google.emptySpreadsheet: The selected spreadsheet does not contain any sheets to import.
google.configDialogDescription:
Provide the Google Client ID and Google API Key that will be used to launch the Google Drive picker.
  1. Open the Google Cloud Console in your browser and sign in with your administrator account.
  2. Select the project you use for EMA (or create a new project from the project picker).
  3. In the left menu choose APIs & Services → Credentials and create both an OAuth 2.0 Client ID (Web application) and an API key.
  4. Still under APIs & Services, open the Google Drive API and Google Picker API pages, then click “Enable” for each.
  5. Copy the generated Client ID and API key into the fields below and click save.
google.configUpdateError: Failed to update Google integration settings.
google.configFetchError: Failed to load Google integration settings.
google.configValidation: Please provide both the Google client ID and API key before saving.

import.confirmUpload: Are you sure you want to upload this {{domain}} template? There will be no rollback.
